Source.Name: mimalloc
Source.Summary: A compact general purpose allocator with excellent performance.
Source.Description: mimalloc (pronounced "me-malloc") is a general purpose allocator with excellent performance characteristics. It is a drop-in replacement for malloc and can be used in other programs without code changes.

Package.Name: mimalloc
Package.Summary: A compact general purpose allocator with excellent performance.
Package.Description: mimalloc (pronounced "me-malloc") is a general purpose allocator with excellent performance characteristics. It is a drop-in replacement for malloc and can be used in other programs without code changes.
